segments.text: Excuse me , Mr . Rodriguez ? Could I speak with you for a moment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t just now , Susan . Could we get together this afternoon ? What ’ s it about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ d like to talk about my new contract with you , if that ’ s all right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that ’ s right . Is that time of the year , huh ? That ’ s fine . How about if we meet at 3:30 this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2
